useReasonQuestion: Why I want to use PressPad
issueQuestion: An issue I want to cover from my hometown / city that I think would be of service to my community, how I would do it and why the story is important to cover or a recent story I wrote or a project I worked on
storyQuestion: A story that shows they have the determination and dedication to enter the journalism and media profession
mentorDescribeQuestion: Why they are looking for a mentor as well as their long-term career ambitions
